title: Timer-Based Auto-Advance
description: Automatically advances the slide after a specified number of seconds.
storyline_instructions: Add as a JavaScript trigger at timeline start.

variables.name: Advance
variables.description: Boolean variable that triggers slide advance in Storyline when set to true.

notes: Adjust 5000 to the desired milliseconds (e.g., 10000 for 10 seconds). Configure Storyline trigger: 'When Advance changes, jump to next slide.'
